    • 方法详细资料

      • fromBitmap

        public static RoundedDrawable fromBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
        从一个Bitmap获取到一个RoundedDrawable对象
        参数:
        bitmap - drawable显示的bitmap图形
        返回:
        如果Bitmap为null，返回null，否则的话调用new RoundedDrawable(Bitmap)构造方法构造一个Drawable对象

      • fromDrawable

        public static Drawable fromDrawable(Drawable drawable)
        通过drawale对象来获取一个RoundedDrawable对象，如果获取失败的话，返回这个drawable本身
        参数:
        drawable -
        返回:

      • setCornerRadius

        public RoundedDrawable setCornerRadius(float radius)
        Sets all corners to the specified radius.
        参数:
        radius - the radius.
        返回:
        the RoundedDrawable for chaining.

      • setCornerRadius

        public RoundedDrawable setCornerRadius(int corner,
                                       float radius)
        Sets the corner radius of one specific corner.
        参数:
        corner - the corner.
        radius - the radius.
        返回:
        the RoundedDrawable for chaining.

      • setCornerRadius

        public RoundedDrawable setCornerRadius(float topLeft,
                                       float topRight,
                                       float bottomRight,
                                       float bottomLeft)
        Sets the corner radii of all the corners.
        参数:
        topLeft - top left corner radius.
        topRight - top right corner radius
        bottomRight - bototm right corner radius.
        bottomLeft - bottom left corner radius.
        返回:
        the RoundedDrawable for chaining.
